document_data.name: Seaeyes Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Seaeyes Tower''',Every tower connected to the Trollwall falls under the designation of "torchtower."<ref group="note" name="major">The sourcebook ''[[City System]]'' states that all torchtowers with names are "major towers".
document_data.Location: This tower stood on [[Westwall Street]], directly across from [[Seaeye's March]] and a few blocks down from [[West Gate]].

Structure.Interior: Being a torchtower, Seaeyes Tower had all the features that were common among them. This included a debriefing room, a small armory, holding cells, storage rooms for the holding of evidence or confiscated items, some bedchambers, and some garderobes.{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-10-17 - Waterdeep's Torchtowers}} Additionally, being a major torchtower, it had six small holding cells that could hold up to ten people, which were used in times of trouble.<ref><ref group="note" name="major" />

document_data.Activities: Like all other torchtowers, this structure had three beacon-fires that were constantly kept on standby.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Seaeyes Tower, like all torchtowers, was manned by members of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]].
